title: FinMin to meet CEOs of PSBs on Tuesday, review progress of financial inclusion schemes
description: The finance ministry called a meeting of heads of Public Sector Banks to review financial inclusion schemes like PM Vishwakarma, Jan Suraksha, and Mudra Yojana, chaired by Financial Services Secretary Vivek Joshi.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
